title: Poulet Au Vinaigre = Cop Au Vin
abstract: Note: Based on 'Une mort en trop' by Dominique Roulet.
description: A quiet little town, like so many others ... Doctor Philippe Morasseau, attorney Hubert Lavoisier and butcher Gerard Filiol are partners in a building project. But first, they must evict the widow Cuno and her son, the village postman. Things take a nasty turn when the doctor's wife disappears and the butcher dies in a car accident. Enters Inspector Lavardin, a hard-nosed cop with unconventional methods. The film was a great box-office success and was followed by a sequel, 'Inspecteur Lavardin' in 1985.  Credits: Producer, Marin Karmitz ; director, Claude Chabrol ; writers, Claude Chabrol, Dominique Roulet ; photography, Jean Rabier ; music, Matthieu Chabrol. Cast: Jean Poiret, Michel Bouquet, Lucas Belvaux, Jean-Claude Bouillaud, Caroline Cellier, Josephine Chaplin, Pauline Lafont, Stephane Audran, Andree Tainsy, Jean Topart.
